paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct new extension of q-Bernoulli and q-Euler numbers and polynomials. These results are generalizations for several well known identities on q-Bernoulli and q-Euler numbers and polynomials, and Carlitz's q-Bernoulli numbers.
paper_title: ON THE (r, q)-BERNOULLI AND (r, q)-EULER NUMBERS AND POLYNOMIALS
